text:
Message 512 of 4024
Please let’s just chat. It’s the emails and texts that get whacky. Not when we talk. Give it a quick chance and if it goes sideways we can stop. I am more
than determined to work positively with you!
Sent:01/18/2024 at 04:08 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/18/2024 at 04:15 PM)
Subject:Re: Friday Move
Message 513 of 4024
So we are back to the waiting game?
Text and emails never work for us.
Can we try something that will?
Please?
Sent:01/18/2024 at 04:13 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/18/2024 at 04:15 PM)
Subject:Re: Friday Move
Message 514 of 4024
Send your list. I have said conversations are always explosive then it’s followed up by angry harassing texts and emails. It’s is documented.
Sent:01/18/2024 at 04:17 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/18/2024 at 04:17 PM)
Subject:Re: Friday Move
Message 515 of 4024
I have sent my list. Phone calls are never explosive because you just hang up. It’s easy. Can we just do that? Hang up like always if you don’t like it.
Text and emails always devolve because they are not a platform for a discussion. They are great for updates and simple questions. That is not what we
are doing.
Can we just cooperate for once?
Sent:01/18/2024 at 04:19 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/18/2024 at 04:20 PM)
Subject:Re: Friday Move
Message 516 of 4024
Sent:01/18/2024 at 04:31 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/18/2024 at 09:23 PM)
Subject:Thanks for the Abusive Converstaion
